profile.name: Murat Gungor
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer
profile.bio: Full-stack developer with over three years of experience and a background in Health Psychology, bringing analytical problem-solving skills to building fast, scalable, and user-focused applications.

projects.title: ShipShip
projects.description: Open-source dynamic boilerplate using Next.js and Payload CMS to help developers launch projects faster with scalable architecture and built-in performance optimizations.
highlights: Instantly integrate authentication, emailing, database configuration, S3 storage and blog section
Built modular, reusable components for rapid application development

projects.title: MaxReach
projects.description: AI-powered LinkedIn outreach tool using APIs and web scraping to enrich profiles, then creating personalized outreach using a fine-tuned GPT 3.5 Turbo AI Model.
highlights: Web scraping and data enrichment at scale
Fine-tuning AI model with best performing outreach text
Data hierarchy to prioritize specific data in the AI model

projects.title: Alzheimer's Detection Model
projects.description: Machine learning model for detecting early signs of Alzheimer's using brain scan images from a Kaggle dataset, developed with Omdena.
highlights: Prevented data leakage by properly splitting data before preprocessing
Applied classification models to support early diagnosis in healthcare

projects.title: Onaegis
projects.description: SaaS website built during a Wix Velo hackathon that detects bot-like behaviours across YouTube accounts using AI classification.
highlights: Built and deployed within hackathon timeframe
Trained AI model on 1,000+ labeled data points
Achieved over 90% accuracy in classification

experience.description: Working across the personalised printing platform to improve performance, SEO, and user experience. Collaborate with design, marketing, and data teams to deliver high-impact features.
highlights: Built reusable UI components and marketing pages for peak e-commerce periods
Migrated legacy frontend code to Qwik, improving load times
Developed order-observability system for customer support teams
Created private S3 uploader package integrated with CEPH
Built automated E2E tests using Playwright

experience.description: Called back to fix bugs, improve performance, integrate Payload CMS, and develop premium features with focus on UX and responsive React components.
highlights: Implemented multi-tenancy with Payload CMS for role-based access
Fixed key bugs and improved UX in staff dashboard
Added email reminders and dynamic client page generation using ISR

experience.description: Collaborated with clients to build Python scripts automating tasks and streamlining workflows.
highlights: Built automation scripts for various client needs
Excellent feedback: "The code is clean and works as designed"

experience.description: Built the MVP for beauty service businesses using Next.js, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Better Auth.
highlights: Built client dashboard with timetable and booking management
Developed algorithm for optimal time slot scheduling

experience.description: Joined volunteer tech team at startup focused on verified social and environmental impact data.
highlights: Debugged and extended frontend functionality using Django
Collaborated with remote international team
Focused on research methodology and statistical analysis
Published research on AI acceptance in healthcare
Strong foundation in research and analytical thinking
Developed quantitative and qualitative research skills

publications.title: Exploring Acceptability of AI-enabled Voice Assistants & Artificial Humans in Healthcare
publications.description: Cross-sectional survey investigating acceptance of AI-based healthcare assistants during COVID-19, using logistic regression and multiple regression analysis.

about.story: My journey combines psychology and technology in unique ways. With a Master's in Health Psychology and a First Class Honours in Psychology, I bring analytical problem-solving skills to software development. I transitioned into tech because I saw the potential to build tools that genuinely help people—from AI-driven healthcare research to booking systems for small businesses.
about.approach: I believe in building fast, scalable applications that prioritize user experience. My psychology background helps me understand user needs at a deeper level, while my technical skills allow me to implement efficient solutions. I'm always learning—whether it's migrating to new frameworks like Qwik or building open-source tools like ShipShip.
